website_summaries.verdict: Natural looks and rugged construction make them an appealing choice for some consumers.
pros: Made of attractive natural slate that complements most decor
cons: some owners don't like this characteristic

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: As noted by other reviews, the height varies between them. I have two that are exactly the same height, one that's a bit thinner, and one that's a bit thicker. It's hard to notice unless they're right next to each other, so this hasn't been a big issue for me. I also had a couple tiny chips that were loose in the box, but I can't tell which coaster they came from and I haven't seen any other parts flake off since I've been using them. I really appreciate how the entire bottom is covered with a cork composite, rather than little separate bumpers like other options I've looked at. It makes the coasters way more stable
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great coasters! Beautiful and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this purchase. I wanted something sleek and stylish without all the gaudy designs so many coasters have. These are perfect. They absorb a normal amount of liquid. The bottom has cork to keep it from scuffing your table. And the customer service was excellent. My order arrived with only 3 coasters. I emailed the company and they sent an additional coaster out immediately with no hassle or headache. Couldn’t be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Fanning

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, deliberate in design, attractively simple.
customer_reviews.text: Really great! The entire bottom is layered with cork, with a ~5.5mm distance from the edge. It’s almost a completely even surface, which is extremely good given that this is cut stone. I tapped all 4 against a wooden surface, and it seems all have a good level of structural integrity. I love the natural look: deliberate in design, but attractively simple. I will definitely buy this again if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Sim

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful slate coasters
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality and beauty of these coasters. I intend to use them for displaying rocks, crystals and minerals. I plan to order more. Very pleased customer. Recommended seller.
customer_reviews.author: BTolle

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed
customer_reviews.text: Really like these! Have had several types of coasters before, but none last. Pretty sure these will. No pattern so looks less cluttered, neutral color that looks great on my ebony coffee table, serves the function of keeping moisture off the table, and like the round shape better than the squares.
customer_reviews.author: Donna H.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, quick shipping - although I thought these had "feet", they do not but they do have cork bottoms to help air out the slate, aiding absorption. Match our decor very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn C

customer_reviews.title: Not slate? White under black paint.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, but they chip and scratch easily to show white underneath the black. Does this mean they aren't slate or just are white slate painted black? I don't know. They work well though.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: They're Ok
customer_reviews.text: The slate does not soak up any liquid. It shows some rings on it that have to be wiped off. The slate flakes often.
customer_reviews.author: Rob O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service and seller response
customer_reviews.text: I received one coaster that was chipped, which appears to be an anomaly which most likely occurred during transit as the coasters were all packaged well, both times they arrived. Although a few also first came with markings I couldn't rub off, I was quickly offered a replacement by the seller when I notified them of all of this and instructions on how to best clean the others. Overall, I am very satisfied with my purchase, the coasters are altogether well made and even heftier than I expected. I would recommend these to anyone looking for weighty, rocky-looking and feeling coasters or other home decor.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Drinks leave permanent marks
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed in these. When new they look cool but once drinks sweat and leave water on them they leave permanent marks and then they don't look very good.
customer_reviews.author: 80s Joe

customer_reviews.title: Sleek & stylish
customer_reviews.text: This product met my expectations. I love the style of these coasters. I everyone in the home gave their approval of the look. Will purchase from the seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great looking coasters
customer_reviews.text: Great looking coasters. Since they're made from real slate and not a mold, of course they are going to vary a bit from each other. Some other reviews seemed surprised by this even though it was written in the product description. The unfinished edges look very cool and are not sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Leeny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and funtional!
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are both beautiful and functional! They go great in any room and match any decor, but most importantly, they work! They have saved my antique tables from moisture and absorb the condensation! Very easy to clean, too! It only takes a quick wipe of a damp cloth. Am very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy W.

customer_reviews.title: Very Unique
customer_reviews.text: I recommend these coasters. They are very unique and make a great conversation piece to your living space. They are made of slate, so special care is needed as slate is brittle, thus the reason for only four stars for durability.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy L Hulsey

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for our new his and hers desk that we built from scratch. My HGTV wanna-be fiancé approves and that really says a lot. Everything has to be oohs and awws in our house. Good looking product. No problems as far as stability or inconsistent thickness.. I'd recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Foley

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Pieces chip off often. They scratched up my wood furniture with their rough, chipped edges. They look nicer than they are and they are very affordable. I wouldn’t buy or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Zoma

customer_reviews.title: Pure and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very natural and organic looking. Could have been a little thicker, but very attractive. Liked them well enough to buy a second set.
customer_reviews.author: nana

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought some nice new furniture and wanted some unique coasters. These are perfect! Simple and interesting at the same time. And, the do what a coaster is meant to do. They collect the moisture from cold glasses and ,somehow, it soaks in or evaporates with no marks on the furniture. They are nice and heavy and provide a nice "clink" when a glass is set on them. Will probably buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and classy.
customer_reviews.text: These coasters look and feel great. Minimalistic, sturdy, and not too sharp/pointy on the edges. Pick up the cheese plate also on sale for a matching "food coaster". Seller is also friendly, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed in what I expected from these slate coasters
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in what I expected from these slate coasters. They are very thin and are breaking a bit around the edges. Only reason I left it two stars is because they are still good as coasters but don't look like they will last at all.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz

customer_reviews.title: Great coasters, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These coasters a beautiful. I love them. Well worth the money. The only thing that bothers me is that one came with a 1" long chip on the top. It's still a whole piece so no big deal and I've been using it to put a candle on.
customer_reviews.author: myhaksown

customer_reviews.title: These are fine for a glass table top but a little rough ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fine for a glass table top but a little rough on the bottom for nice wood finish. You would want to put felt tabs on them if you were going to use them on any surface that is more sensitive to scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Moore

customer_reviews.title: Real Slate
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are real natural stone and can flake. They look great on my marble top tables. Bonus: being round they never look out of place or off angle.
customer_reviews.author: Babe

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Flat surface, heavy enough to not lift off with glass. Would complement any style from high tech to rustic.
customer_reviews.author: winnie

customer_reviews.title: But more than that I am delighted that they actually absorbe moisture
customer_reviews.text: I am very please with the design. But more than that I am delighted that they actually absorbe moisture. Have not use the cheeseboard yet but it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Honey too

customer_reviews.title: Super cool coasters
customer_reviews.text: I love these coasters. They're perfect! My style is warm industrial, and these coasters totally add to the look.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and unusual coasters
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, substantial pieces. I love them. They are almost little pieces of art.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: The perfect slate coasters and also very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these since the minute I opened them. The perfect slate coasters and also very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Large enough for any but the largest mugs with three feet on each coaster to prevent table scratches. The tops of the coasters are even smoother and more level than they appear in the photos. Great value for the product. They do not weigh too much either, so easy to move if desired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They are durable, stylish, and flat. (I didn't think that they were flat). I absolutely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my granddaughter's new bedroom (done in black and white). They are so nice, I've decided that I will get some more for Christmas presents. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Houston reader

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend love them! They were a housewarming gift for him since he's moving out for graduate school. Very nice touch to his place!
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Either there's some sort of powder/glaze on them, or they stain easily. After a few uses they already have circle marks from bottles of water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great high quality product! Solid product, durable and post importantly looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous pieces, packed well and fantastically fast shipping, ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous pieces, packed well and fantastically fast shipping, thanks. Lovely item, lovely seller. Will likely buy these again as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coaster deal.
customer_reviews.text: Nice slate coasters with natural edge, large enough to handle most glasses or cups. Stylish and they have protective felts on bottom. A good value overall
customer_reviews.author: momtaxinurse

customer_reviews.title: They have a nice non-scratch base
customer_reviews.text: These are just the right size! They have a nice non-scratch base. They are too small for a beer mug, but I prefer the smaller less bulky coaster anyway. Perfect for my wineglass or regular glassware. They fit nicely in my nightstand and are attractive on my coffee table. I purchased two sets for two different spaces in my home.
customer_reviews.author: mishthedish

customer_reviews.title: stained after one use.
customer_reviews.text: Due to the material these coasters end up stained white after one use. A small amount of moisture makes them look terrible. Not something you want to leave out on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: p_h

customer_reviews.title: He is going for the restoration look so they will be perfect. Being slate
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my sons new apartment. He is going for the restoration look so they will be perfect. Being slate,they did flake a little during shipping. Might consider wrapping them individually. Love the felt on the bottom. Will probably order another set.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Moore Blackerby

customer_reviews.title: These are great and just what I was looking for to update ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great and just what I was looking for to update my coffee table. Beautiful natural slate, easily wipes clean with a damp cloth, does not stick to glasses/mugs with condensation. Timely shipping, no broken pieces. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality-you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly as you would hope for-actual slate, bumpers on the bottom. I use 3 of these as a stand for a 3 pointed very expensive animal sculpture-these may the whole sculpture pop due to the quality of the stone and its rough features. High quality-you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lavan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Coasters are great nice solid weight to each unit fit into my space perfectly real slate and super clean
customer_reviews.author: Rashad Robinson

customer_reviews.title: They made a great addition to the black piano top where guests always ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how quickly these arrived! And the coasters look exactly as pictured. They made a great addition to the black piano top where guests always seem to set their drinks.
customer_reviews.author: John Bratager

customer_reviews.title: Great product and highly recommend for anyone looking for nice and durable coasters.
customer_reviews.text: Love these coasters, they looking awesome and hold up well too. Great addition to any coffee table. This is the second set I've purchased and i give them out as gifts too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great! You get exactly what you're seeing in the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! You get exactly what you're seeing in the photo. They are heavy duty, no flimsy cheap coasters. They look great on my coffee table!
customer_reviews.author: Dreyke

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, received quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, received quickly, would definitely order again and recommend to others....great job...thanks!
customer_reviews.author: VLP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These are just as described and exactly what I was looking for. They were well packaged and arrived on time. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Useless. The water pools on top of the coaster ...
customer_reviews.text: Useless. The water pools on top of the coaster then spills over onto your furniture. Don’t waste your money on these!!
customer_reviews.author: kaye

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Loved them, they were just what I was looking for my drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: 1 broken
customer_reviews.text: good quality but one came broken. Too cheap to do a return, maybe some better packaging, aside form that they are just as described
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking coasters. We have been getting compliments about them since they are not the usual.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Tihanyi

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty sharp on the edges so be careful of scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really heavy and nice quality. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erica S.

customer_reviews.title: Happy With These Coasters
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are very pretty and nicely made. They are heavy due to the slate material. It comes in a package of 4. I've already received compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Root McCleary

customer_reviews.title: Nice coasters
customer_reviews.text: Look nice and function well, however wet spots on the surface leave darkened areas, and they do tend to chip fairly easily. Both are side effects of the slate material, and should be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love these. They look really good on our concrete coffee table my boyfriend made.
customer_reviews.author: VeggieJen

customer_reviews.title: I wish it had 4 padding feet instead of 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had 4 padding feet instead of 3. If you have a heavy glass on it, and you are slightly off center, it can start to tilt, eventually flipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great shape but very thin and fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Received them in great shape. Are much thinner than I expected which makes them very fragile so be careful with these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonncustomerr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I use the cheese board for my whiskey bottles and the coasters for my glasses. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Very nice coasters!
customer_reviews.text: They look just like the picture, and go very well in the room we bought them for. I would recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Will order from again
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly and product is exactly what is listed. Very nice and thankful for receiving such great service and I thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lita M.

customer_reviews.title: Natural beauty
customer_reviews.text: Good Job EMEMO an true artistic expression within functionality, beautifly finished item. This listing is incredible within a fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Santi

customer_reviews.title: Great natural coasters
customer_reviews.text: Coasters are great. I really like the way they look on my darker tables. I would definitely get some if you want an interesting, natural looking coster.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: These coasters are great! Nice sleek design with padding underneath so as ...
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are great! Nice sleek design with padding underneath so as not to damage the table. Great seller too- shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: G. Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful coasters, authentic and well made, love the plush bottoms protecting my glass coffee table. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lil

customer_reviews.title: Slick coasters
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product! They look really nice and go very well with my black desk.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: and look great! They're good quality
customer_reviews.text: The coasters are as pictured -- simple, stylish, and look great! They're good quality, and I can tell will last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: James Sadler

customer_reviews.title: They look nice, however
customer_reviews.text: These coasters retain water spots, and are not absorbent. They look nice, however.
customer_reviews.author: Inland Northwest Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice but needs better quality control.
customer_reviews.text: Product looks good unfortunately one of the 4 was broken. The box it was sent in was in perfect shape so i can only assume one was put in that way.
customer_reviews.author: Lennek

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made. No flaws. Great price. Timely delivery Love them
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L Morse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look great, protect my coffee table from sweating glasses, and the edge is well done
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product. Came out great and better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful pieces. They are exactly as pictured and my ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful pieces. They are exactly as pictured and my boyfriend loves them! I would definitely buy them again and suggest them as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, works great. What more do you wanna know? They're coasters.
customer_reviews.author: Iman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The coasters look nice but leave water mark rings on them unlike sandstone coasters
customer_reviews.author: Marla K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Coasters are very pretty and have foam pads on the bottom, perfect for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Devin J Whelan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price, quick delivery, and a really nice product. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful coasters!
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are well made and have a timeless look. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tips drinks over
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and well made in terms of the slate itself. Only one small problem. It has only 3 pieces of spongy adhesive padding on the bottom instead of 4 to balance it properly. This caused it to tip over and spill my coffee on one occasion due to the triangular 3 legged stool effect. I now have to be very careful anytime I place something on it to make certain it is perfectly centered. I plan to buy more pads and replace the 3 with 4 to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome, best coasters for suuuure.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was bummed because one came broken... Swiftly, homeboy who makes these sent me out TWO, not one, TWO replacements!! What a guy! I spent 3 days trying to find the best set on amazon, I believe I found them. They don't leak at all and they look fantastic. They match with pretty much every surface imaginable. Stop looking, just grab these and be stoked AF. Cheers ~
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're OK, but not without fault
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be great, but after one use I'm disappointed. I only had a glass of cold water on it, and it left a permanent ring on the coaster. I waited a couple days to see if maybe it would go away, but no joy. It looks horrible now. I'm not upset, though. It kept the ring off of my coffee table!
customer_reviews.author: George Pappals

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically Pleasing, But NOT Functional
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the way these look, but unfortunately, they don't do the job a coaster is ultimately supposed to do...protect the surface upon which the coaster and drink rest. The perspiration from cold drinks pools on the coaster, and eventually, makes its way down the edges and onto the counter/table/desk. Sorry guys, but this is a bust.
customer_reviews.author: Jiventurkey

customer_reviews.title: I normally don't write bad reviews, but I hope this one keep somebody ...
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are junk! One is only one eighth of an inch thick, and all of them are unstable due to the location of the pads underneath. I normally don't write bad reviews, but I hope this one keep somebody else from having a bad experience exclamation point
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One of the coasters were broke in half when I opened the package.
customer_reviews.author: chris Boone

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Stone Coasters!
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are very authentic, good stone, pleasing to the eye. Our clients have been complimenting them, asking where they were purchased. I will share the link, as the owner of this store is a college student. Gotta help pay for all the books! You should do the same. They're beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't look as nice as I expected. Wife hated them.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Pictures cannot describe the great quality
customer_reviews.text: The product is wonderful. I also ordered another slate plate. Both items are beyond great. Least but not the least, the owner emailed me an email to follow up and appreciates my business with sincere words stating he is self employed and a student currently, I am glad to work with him and would love to recommend him and his product to people who have been searching nice slate products.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Chang

customer_reviews.title: Best Coaster You Could Buy
customer_reviews.text: Everyone I know swears on wood, bamboo, or polished stone. What they soon realize is wood cracks and water seeps through, bamboo molds, and polished stone...water accumulates on the surface, and if the coaster doesn't stick to the cup, falls off, and shatters, then the water will run off the sides of the surface and leave a larger mark. Slate will absorb (a standard amount - don't soak your coaster) water without sticking, cracking, or molding. So it leaves a ring or two on the coaster every now and then; that let's you know it's working. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: MetalSparks

customer_reviews.title: Slate coasters
customer_reviews.text: They are slate. I've dropped one or two, and they chip. They don't absorb water, and the uneven surface often keeps glasses from sticking to the coasters when the glasses sweat -- often, but not always. That's how I dropped them.
customer_reviews.author: P. Stripling

customer_reviews.title: I do really them quality is good and doesn't stick to my glass like so many ...
customer_reviews.text: I do really them quality is good and doesn't stick to my glass like so many others. But this is what I feelsets it apart from other you have litt rubbing things on the bottom which make it harder for things to stick and get pick up with it so that is a really nice touch I need some quality for the fancy holder I got and this was what I need thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Stone coasters for the win
customer_reviews.text: A great coaster set... I like the simple stone look, & the fact that I don’t need to worry about condensation sticking the coaster to the bottom of my glass. Also, I was looking for a coaster that worked with a custom made table... whaddya think? Vadery enough?
customer_reviews.author: Paul R. Baumeister Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap looking, they have a more expensive feel.
customer_reviews.text: I love these coasters! They look perfect in my living area, they are organic and look more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Harman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They have a nice heft to them but not at all too heavy. The whole base was cork so there’s no worry of it sliding around, and it doesn’t stick to the glass when I’m picking it back up. Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Shari R

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Natural
customer_reviews.text: Great size and look very natural. They "stain" easily, but nothing a Clorox wipe can't fix
customer_reviews.author: Darby

customer_reviews.title: There are three foam pads stuck to the bottom side ...
customer_reviews.text: There are three foam pads stuck to the bottom side of the coasters. Unfortunately that's not enough to be stable. If you put your glass down too close to the edge of the coaster, it will tilt, potentially spilling your drink.
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, rugged-looking coasters. The one downside is they get quite warm (likely because of the material).
customer_reviews.author: Seon Kinrot

customer_reviews.title: Nice Coasters
customer_reviews.text: Sounds weird, but I get a lot of compliments on our coasters. These are unique and they look great. They are coasters, so not much to say on how they work .... they do their job well:)
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: I love these coasters
customer_reviews.text: I love these coasters. Most looks so dated or formal or even feminine. These were perfect! They just look like slabs of stone. I haven't had any breakage yet, but I can see on the ends where the stone is thin where it could break if dropped.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful natural slate coasters!
customer_reviews.text: We love these beautiful, natural slate coasters. So much nicer than plastic and other alternatives. Arrived promptly and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Snoqualmie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Lovely+Original+elegant+minimal...but...
customer_reviews.text: I love them, nevertheless they are a little bit sharp at the edges...so you have to carefull with your furniture. Very original, elegant and minimal pieces. It would be nice if the purchase can be done by piece, the package of four litims you; I had to buy 2 packages because I need 6 pieces.
customer_reviews.author: LULA

product_meta.title: Round Slate Coasters by EMEMO® - Set of 4 Unique, Handmade Coasters For Drinks, Beverages, Wine Glasses - Elegant Look & Unmatched Furniture Protection - Made Of Genuine Black Slate
product_meta.description:
Color:Round Coaster Set| Size:4x4 inchesAmaze Your Dinner Guests With The EMEMO Black Slate Designer Coasters! 

Make any dinner, party or home event a little more special with our slate designer coasters. Your friends and guests are bound to ask where you got these fancy coasters from! Be sure to tell them! 

Handmade Quality 

Break the monotony of factory-produced, identical items. Our slate coaster set contains 4 coasters of the same size but of unique, handcrafted pattern. Enjoy your drink while admiring the elaborate, jagged edges of your coaster! 

The EMEMO black slate coasters are made from the finest charcoal slate. No chemicals involved! 

Protect Your Table From Rings And Scratches 

Every individual coaster in our black coaster set comes with 4 felt bumpers, ensuring your table remains both ring-free and scratch-free! 

Easy Buy
